text: Yves Camille Désiré Leterme (born 6 October 1960) is a Belgian politician of the CD&V.; Leterme was born in Wervik. He was prime minister twice: in 2008 and from 2009 to 2011. He was also foreign affairs minister and prime minister of Flanders. == References == * Flemish Parliament Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian Roman Catholics Category:Christelijke Volkspartij politicians Category:Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams politicians Category:Flemish politicians Category:Government ministers of Belgium Category:People from West Flanders Category:Prime ministers of Belgium
title: Yves Leterme
